alert.note: Alert for Alleghany; Surry (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 12 at 7:31PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Alleghany and northwestern Surry Counties in northwestern North Carolina, southwestern Carroll and southeastern Grayson Counties in southwestern Virginia and the City of Galax through 815 PM EDT... At 730 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Glade Valley, or near Sparta, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Galax... Sparta... Ennice... Bottom... Mountain Park... Roaring Gap... and Baywood. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Locally heavy rain will quickly reduce visibility and result in ponding of water on roadways, standing water in low lying areas, and minor flooding of creeks, streams, and areas of poor drainage. Drivers are urged to slow down and use extra caution to avoid hydroplaning.
